text: The women's 195 + 390 + 585 + 780 metres medley relay event at the 1969 European Indoor Games was held on 8 March in Belgrade. The first athlete ran one lap of the 195-metre track, the second two, the third three and the anchor four, thus 10 laps or 1950 metres in total. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%" |- !Rank !Nation !Competitors !Time !Notes |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Vera Popkova Lyudmila Samotyosova Raisa Nikonorova Anna Zimina || 4:52.4 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Irena Szewińska Zdzisława Robaszewska Elżbieta Skowrońska Zofia Kołakowska || 4:53.2 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Verica Ambrozi Ika Maričić Mirjana Kovačev Ninoslava Tikvicki || 5:05.9 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Györgyi Balogh Antónia Munkácsi Magdolna Kulcsár Olga Kazi || || |} ==References== Category:4 × 400 metres relay at the European Athletics Indoor Championships Relay
title: 1969 European Indoor Games – Women's medley relay
